t: Marvel Studios Skips Comic Con Hall H In 2025 - Dark Horizons
s: 3 days ago - Marvel Studios has confirmed that they will not be holding a panel in Hall H at this year’s edition of the San Diego Comic Con. The news isn’t surprising as it follows in the wake of “Avengers: Doomsday” being pushed from a planned May 2026 to December 2026 release.
